Case# CFNumberFormatterStyle.currencyAccountingStyle

iOS 9.0+iPadOS 9.0+Mac Catalyst 13.1+macOS 10.11+tvOS 9.0+visionOS 1.0+watchOS 2.0+

```
case currencyAccountingStyle
```

## [See Also](/documentation/CoreFoundation/CFNumberFormatterStyle/currencyAccountingStyle#see-also)

### [Enumeration Cases](/documentation/CoreFoundation/CFNumberFormatterStyle/currencyAccountingStyle#Enumeration-Cases)

[`case currencyISOCodeStyle`](/documentation/corefoundation/cfnumberformatterstyle/currencyisocodestyle)[`case currencyPluralStyle`](/documentation/corefoundation/cfnumberformatterstyle/currencypluralstyle)[`case currencyStyle`](/documentation/corefoundation/cfnumberformatterstyle/currencystyle)Specifies a currency style format.[`case decimalStyle`](/documentation/corefoundation/cfnumberformatterstyle/decimalstyle)Specifies a decimal style format.[`case noStyle`](/documentation/corefoundation/cfnumberformatterstyle/nostyle)Specifies no style.[`case ordinalStyle`](/documentation/corefoundation/cfnumberformatterstyle/ordinalstyle)[`case percentStyle`](/documentation/corefoundation/cfnumberformatterstyle/percentstyle)Specifies a percent style format.[`case scientificStyle`](/documentation/corefoundation/cfnumberformatterstyle/scientificstyle)Specifies a scientific style format.[`case spellOutStyle`](/documentation/corefoundation/cfnumberformatterstyle/spelloutstyle)Specifies a spelled out format.
